nodes.text: Sellasas was a planet with an Imperial and civilian presence soon after the Battle of Yavin.

During the early years of the Galactic Civil War, the planet was under the administration of Governor Jedselk. Sellasas, and the Imperial army garrison there, were laid siege to by a Rebel strike force in the wake of the Battle of Yavin. Tyionsis Cex and Amara Jedselk, the governor's daughter, were combatants in the siege.
